greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: This table (read by rows) shows the coefficients of sum formulas of n-th subfactorial numbers (A000166). The n-th row (n>=1) contains T(i,n) for i=1 to n, where T(i,n) satisfies Subf(n) = Sum_{i=1..n} T(i,n) * n^(n-i).
results.author: _André F. Labossière_, Dec 06 2004
